description: Manifest defining mandatory, immutable constants and tiered operational thresholds required by Core Decision Axioms (COF/P-01 Finality) and GSEP-C V3.5 Layer L7. Structured for flattened, efficient read operations.

CONSTANTS.RATIONALE_TAU_NORM: Normalization constant preventing division by zero and establishing minimum systemic risk weight.
CONSTANTS.RATIONALE_EPSILON_MIN: The minimum required viable safety margin (P-01 Certification buffer).

COF_MAX_DEVIATION.rationale: Maximum allowed divergence in COF stability checks before initiating an immediate Axiom Halt (S-03 Protocol).

GSEP_MAX_ITERATIONS.rationale: Hard limit on iterative cycles within GSEP-C V3.5 Layer L7 computation layers to prevent infinite loop or resource exhaustion.

P01_LOW_CONFIDENCE_WARNING.rationale: If P-01 finality confidence falls below this level, generate a persistent audit warning, allowing processing to continue under monitoring.
